recommendations.housing: Consider kosts or apartments in areas like Tebet or Pasar Minggu for better value.
recommendations.mobile_internet: Check for better packages from providers like Telkomsel, XL, or Indihome.
recommendations.food: Cooking at home can reduce costs to IDR 2.5M/month.
recommendations.transportation: Using MRT and TransJakarta can save up to 50% of costs compared to ride-hailing.
